import React, { useState } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" const Edit = () => { const [inpval, setINP] = useState({ name: "", email: "", age: "", mobile: "", work: "", add: "", desc: "", }) const { id } = useParams("") const getdata = async () => { const res = await fetch(`/employee/${id}`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "applicaiton/json", }, }) const data = res.data console.log("data") setINP(data) } const setdata = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setINP((preval) => { return { ...preval, [name]: value, } }) } const addinpdata = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const { name, email, work, add, mobile, desc, age } = inpval const res = await fetch("/register", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ name, email, work, add, mobile, desc, age, }), }) const data = await res.json() if (res.status === 422 || !data) { console.log("error ") alert("error") } else { alert("user registered") console.log("data added") } } return (
) } export default Edit
